name: EcoRun
description:
Mobile and PC version available.

PC Controls -

A - Dash Left

D - Dash Right

S - Slide

Space - Jump

This project was done by a team of 5.

Gideon Francis - Programmer

Chin Wei Xuan - Programmer

Gwendalyn Toh - Artist

Limbaroyati - Artist

Min Khant Ko - Programmer

Made in 24-30 hours.
